snippet: President Goodluck Jonathan on Thursday fired his military’s leaders after a court ruled that their appointments had been illegal.
abstract: Nigeria's Pres Goodluck Jonathan fires his military leaders after court rules that their appointments were illegal; leaders of army, navy and air force, who have been at the vanguard of efforts to end Islamist insurgency, have all been replaced.
lead_paragraph: President Goodluck Jonathan on Thursday fired his military’s leaders after a court ruled that their appointments had been illegal.
